name: RangeBorder
description: Represents the border of an object.

properties.name: color
properties.description: HTML color code representing the color of the border line, of the form #RRGGBB (e.g. "FFA500") or as a named HTML color (e.g. "orange").

properties.name: tintAndShade
properties.description: Returns or sets a double that lightens or darkens a color for Range Border, the value is between -1 (darkest) and 1 (brightest), with 0 for the original color.

properties.name: style
properties.description: One of the constants of line style specifying the line style for the border.

properties.name: sideIndex
properties.description: Constant value that indicates the specific side of the border.

properties.name: weight
properties.description: Specifies the weight of the border around a range.
